Grounded thought hard for a bit. "All right, I announce now the death 
sentence on Deemos for crimes first and second degree murder.  It is 
now, your duty to kill him, Aerotaur.  Not a savage grudge, but a law 
announced. We will not kill like ancient transformeres.  His so 
called, lackeys, also have a death sentence for protecting aiding a 
fellons escape.  Does this suit you both."
--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> "When wiull we started to train Uncle Aerotaur?????" said Trinity
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Aerotaur::
> >     "I'm sorry Grounded but Deemos has hurt us too many times for 
> me to let 
> > him live.  This is all because I let him go the first time he 
> attacked.  As 
> > for you Sarge, I have just as much reason to kill him.  In our 
last 
> fight I 
> > lost an arm and a leg defending others.  I nearly died because 
> there were 
> > bots in the battle that shouldn't have been there.  I couldn't 
care 
> less 
> > about his lackeys.  Now then, let's get to the meeting so we can 
> finish it 
> > and start planning our attack."  He stands tall glaring at Sarge.
